ygData.subject: Re: its ok
ygData.msgSnippet: Lonely cleric ? What game are YOU playing? Most clerics will find a group regardless as to WHERE they go. A good cleric will enable a group to fight things on
ygData.messageBody:
"Lonely cleric"? What game are YOU playing? Most
clerics will find a group regardless as to WHERE they go.
A good cleric will enable a group to fight things
on average 3 or 4 levels higher than they were
fighting previously.<br><br>Just make sure your cleric
knows their job, and isn't tossing nukes out there in
battle when it's unnecessary. That kind of cleric will
get you killed.<br><br>And clerics kick ass in PvP.
Flash of Light, Stun, all those neat little 1st level
spells can be deadly in PvP.<br><br>Tyral
Stormfang<br>Captain of the Knights of Prophecy<br>Lanys T'Vyl
